short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A free tool to automate removal of URLs in bulk.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dear Users,
Our extension has faced an attack of negative reviews from our paid competitor.
They come in batches of 3-4, not saying much about the problem, with a range of time of 1-3 weeks. 
Our extension will always be free, so you do not need to worry. 
If we helped you, please, leave a nice review!

Introducing the Google Console Bulk URL Remover Extension, an efficient tool that makes managing your Google search results a breeze. This Chrome extension is carefully crafted for webmasters, SEO professionals and anyone seeking to maintain a organized presence. It simplifies the task of tidying up updating and streamlining your URLs in Google Search Console.

FAQ (Please, read if you have a problem with the extensin):
!!! Please, make sure to refresh the page before executing the extension !!!

1. Where should the extension be opened and run?
- On the removals page of Google Search Console (https://search.google.com/search-console/removals);

2. How should I separate the links?
- The links should be separated by a new line (Enter), in a new version we will introduce other types of separation;

3. What language my browser should be set to?
- On the current version of the extension, your browser and the page are required to be set to "English" as the logic of the extension depends on it.

4. Why does Google show "Invalid sitemap address"?
- The error usually pops up when you try to remove an URL from a website different from the one chosen in the top of the page (property).

Version 1.86, Release log:
- A new feature of the Bulk Inspection and re-submitting for re-indexing if the URL is live. (Just press Start Inspection, or Start Removals for the old Removals).

Version 1.8, Release log:
- Added saving of links when closing the extension (if file uploaded/"Start" pressed).
- Changing the Stylings.

Version 1.7, Release log:
- Increased performance.
- Changed the Algorithm.
- Decreased the size.
- Added a How-To-Guide.

Version 1.6, Release log:
- Solved the bug when there are too many links to submit.
- Solved the bug when the console is in the other versions of English (UK, Canada, India, etc).

Version 1.5, Release log:
- Added an alert every time a link is submitted/failed.
- Added a prevention of running the script on a wrong page.
- Added a prevention of running the script in a wrong language.
- Added additional checks for the links format.

We're continuously dedicated to enhancing our product. If you have any suggestions, ideas, or feedback on how we can make it even better, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. Your input is invaluable in helping us improve our offering and provide you with the best possible experience. Contact us anytime; we're here to listen and evolve with your needs.
